name: VR Nature
description:
Do you have a VR headset? Perfect! In VR Nature you will explore a virtual world full of stunning scenery. 360 degrees of beauty. Calm music and fascinating views will calm you down while guaranteeing the best user experience. You can walk by tapping on the screen. Be careful: You may spend hours just enjoying the beauty of our nature.

Works with Google Cardboard or any other VR headset compatible with your iPhone.
